product_name: Topeak RX BeamRack with Side Frame - V-Type
long_description: This Topeak seatpost-mounted, quick-release rack attaches easily, and its compact size makes it ideal for road bikes. This QuickTrack(TM) system is compatible with RX-series TrunkBags(TM). Hinged clamp with stainless-steel bolts mounts to seatpost, offering a secure hold. Carries up to 15-pound loads, secured with built-in bungee cords running the length of the rack. Comes equipped with side frames to let you attach panniers. Tubular aluminum construction features a compartment for storing small items. Fits seatpost diameters from 25.4 - 31.8mm. Compatible with RX Trunk Bag, sold separately.
short_description: This Topeak seatpost-mounted, quick-release rack attaches easily, and its compact size makes it ideal for road bikes. This QuickTrack(TM) system is compatible with RX-series TrunkBags(TM).
